title: Image can't be refreshed after importing again
OB: After importing the 'image1.jpg' into the layout again, the image is not being refreshed.
EB: The expected behavior is that the new image should be displayed after importing it again.
SR: 1. Import the 'image1.jpg' into the layout. 2. Import the 'image1.jpg' into the layout again. Verify that the new image is displayed instead of the original image.
